name: Minimal Drum and Bass
description: Minimalist, sparse sound; emerged in two main 2000s strains, one Dubstep-inspired and one IDM-inspired, which crossed paths in the 2010s.

children.name: Autonomic
children.description: Mechanical, machine-like, "autonomic" rhythms that take primary influence from the cold, minimal sounds of mid-2000s UK Dubstep.

children.name: Autonomic
children.description: Mechanical, machine-like, "autonomic" rhythms that take primary influence from the cold, minimal sounds of mid-2000s UK Dubstep.

children.name: Microfunk
children.description: Minimal, glitchy, and "bleep"-y sound inspired by IDM.
